scripts.verify-hooks: node -e "try{const fs=require('fs');const hooks=['pre-commit','pre-push'];const missing=hooks.filter(h=>!fs.existsSync(`.git/hooks/${h}`));if(missing.length){console.error('❌ Missing hooks:',missing.join(', '));console.log('Run: npm run prepare');process.exit(1);}else{console.log('✅ All hooks installed');}}catch(e){console.error('Error:',e.message);process.exit(1);}"
